description: From Jan. 1, 2026, a health insurer will not be able to fund organ transplant surgery if the operation takes place in China or the organ is from China.

description: U.S. President Donald Trump unveiled his long-promised plan seeking to rebalance global trade with reciprocal U.S. tariffs on April 2, but didn’t impose new tariffs on Canada. description: A Saskatchewan court has determined a Regina oil refinery was justified in firing two employees who refused to comply with the company’s COVID-19 testing policy.
